sentences.english: It was the beginning of another long week.
sentences.chinese: 這只是一場持續一週的拉鋸戰的開始。

sentences.english: Dark energy basically works against gravity in a tug-of-war.
sentences.chinese: 大體上，暗能量在與引力展開一場拉鋸戰。

sentences.english: The fight against AIDS will be a long drawn fight.
sentences.chinese: 與艾滋病的鬥爭將會是一場曠日持久的拉鋸戰。
